Package game_main

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameWindow
    The class GameWindow is the main class of this component.User of this component can extend this class and get game screen with game loop.The game loop is provided by MainThread class.User must implement 3 abstract methods of this class to make his game.The GameWindow.load(),GameWindow.update() and GameWindow.draw() method.
    MainThread
    The MainThread class working in background and allows dynamic in the game.The main function of this class is to call GameWindow.update() and GameWindow.draw() method multiple times in second MainThread.targetTime.This class is vital for game because game must always be interactive and dynamic.
    Player
    This class represent the game object in player control.It contains Sprite2D,control buttons and other necessarily parameters.It has integrated functionality to move in all directions, user only need to select button for each direction.The position is represent with Vector2.Component x of vector is x coordinate of player and component y is y coordinate of player.
Author:
Comexetina
